bwwExcerpt: That ghastly waking nightmare will give you some idea of what it’s like to sit through the new musical “Tammy Faye,” which opened Thursday at the Palace Theatre after its world premiere last year in London. nycTheatreExcerpt: "Because so much of "Tammy Faye" takes place on the set of "The PTL Club," the thought can't be avoided, "Why didn't I just stay home and watch something on Hulu instead?"
